acceptance_criteria: Shows completion message, displays approved affirmations
closed_reason: Created step-completion.tsx with StepCompletion component. Shows 'You're all set, {name}' headline with cherry blossom emoji, encouraging copy about kind words, and CTA 'See my affirmations' that expands to show the approved list. Empty state shows encouraging message. Updated fo-experience.tsx to import and use the new component at case 10.
